subject: Madison Square Garden
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: For Max Pacioretty, a rookie forward for the Montreal Canadiens, playing on a line with one of his Ranger idols, Alex Kovalev, on Wednesday was a dream come true.
snippet: For Max Pacioretty, a rookie forward for the Montreal Canadiens, playing on a line with one of his Ranger idols, Alex Kovalev, on Wednesday was a dream come true.
